description:
With VLAN manager mode of nova-network in multi_host config, a gateway composed of a VLAN interface with a bridge is created on host for each instantiated private network if a VM use it.
But if private network gateway which isn't no more used by a VM on the host, it's still set up. Nothing deletes it.
title: Nova network - Teardown unused networks in VLAN manager mode
